attributes.action: Ban front end advertising of adult sites on all user internet sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is abolutely wrong to advertise pornography and images relating to it on sites accessed by children of all ages. This should be banned along with the practice of the premium rate telephone services accessed by a click of a mouse on the same sites. These sites need government regulation and direct intervention.
